          <title>
            <string language="en">Rock formation from magma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Felsenanordnung vom Magma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation de roche à partir de magma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação de rocha do magma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione rocciosa a partire da magma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός βράχου από το μάγμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de roca del magma</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how rocks like granite are formed from molten magma.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cooling granite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heating</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rock formation</string>
          </keyword>

            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Felsen wie Granit vom 
flüssigen Magma gebildet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment des roches 
comme le granit sont formées du magma fondu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como as rochas como o 
granito são dadas forma do magma derretido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come le roccie come 
granito sono formate da magma fuso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς οι βράχοι όπως το 
γρανίτη διαμορφώνονται από το λειωμένο μάγμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo las rocas como el
granito se forman del magma fundido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
